comment:
Both of them are great.

I saw Amber Heard for the first time in Aquaman.  If I can recall correctly.

Amber Heard was great as Meera.  She is sure good to look at.  :)

In my opinion, I believe public opinion,  can get carried away,  when they tend to mix private life with acting.  Amber Heard's private affairs should have nothing to do with her casting.  That's just a lot of wishful thinking,  from people who want bad things to happen to her.

Hopefully, WarnerBros will not fall to the pressures of "CHAOTIC MINDS" like what Disney is currently doing.  It's a recipe for disaster.

However, anyone of those young ladies would be great for that role.
